item.description: SPECIAL HOLIDAY MEETUP AND LOCATION!! Let's have dinner at the famous East Side Restaurant in New Britain and toast the holidays together!This is the restaurant that was featured in December 9th's Hartford Courant,about the live accordian music page H1. Are you looking for an opportunity to practice your German? Come dine with us to celebrate the season. They have a fabulous mural of Heidelberg and German food (with something for vegetarians!). Whether you are a native speaker, learned German in Germany or in college, high school or on your own, welcome! Let's have another lively meetup. Please come prepared to have a fun and interesting evening speaking with German speakers from all over the world! We're meeting a bit earlier than usual.Please let me know if you're attending because the restaurant needs a head count. Zicke,zacke,zicke,zacke,oi oi oi!!
item.name: The West Hartford German Kaffeeklatsch Holiday Meetup
